headline: AbbVie completes acquisition of Gilgamesh Pharmaceuticals’ bretisilocin
summary: AbbVie (ABBV) announced that it has completed its acquisition of Gilgamesh Pharmaceuticals’ lead investigational candidate, bretisilocin. Bretisilocin is a novel, short-acting serotonin 5-HT2A receptor agonist and 5-HT releaser currently in Phase 2 clinical development for the treatment of patients with moderate-to-severe major depressive disorder. This next-generation 5-HT2A receptor agonist is designed to help address current development challenges observed with classic psychedelic compounds.

content.title: AbbVie completes acquisition of Gilgamesh Pharmaceuticals’ bretisilocin
